attributes.action: Increase Mileage Allowance from 45p to 60p rate per mile for first 15,000 miles.
attributes.additional_details: Soar cost of fuel, well known inflation, cost of living, cost of using own vehicle dramatically increased. New Lease cars for business cost also increased, with uncertainties for many businesses may wish not to increase liabilities mean employees may be encouraged use their own vehicle. Mileage Allowance shall be retrospectively updated to current economical situation.
attributes.background: Increase Mileage Allowance from 45p to 60p rate per mile for first and first threshold allowance increased form 10,000 mile to 15,000 miles. Adjust allowance to reflect current cost of transportation, travel.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase the tax-free approved Mileage Allowance Payment rate and review yearly: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601286

Increase the HMRC Mileage Rate from 45p/mile to 60p/mile: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600966
